transArray.content: The clean and hygienic service is attentive, and they also give small gifts. It is very good. The breakfast is also quite rich. I will come back next time I check in. Well, I recommend it to everyone. There is also a free parking space!

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. , it is very close to 301 Hospital, subway and bus stations, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. Looking forward to seeing you again. I wish you a happy life, General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
